name: Arthenos!, The Producer
description: - [ ] A special gift for Dani, who loves both music & pixel art (among other important stuff). In this particular artwork, we can see an animal called "Chigüirica", which is the character he used for his genesis song for a collective drop. Since I haven't met Dani's face, I decided to use the "Chigüirica" in order to illustrate Dani, who is producing music in a "pixeled-studio". I made this idea because, of what I've seen, Dani has a dream of becoming a producer "little, by little", as he said.
